channel.title: Buying rs2 acc's?
channel.description: Well if I buy a runescape account online what are the chances of me being banned? Thanks.

What sets off an alarm at Jagex would be if you buy an account from a gold farmer site. Why? Because the gold farmers IP say its in South Pacific/Asia, and most people live in Europe/US and they log on that, it makes it obvious.
[/quote]Um I say I am Chinese nub and I move to USA no?[/quote]

Well, you know what I mean.

item.title: Buying rs2 acc's?
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

Ill tell you this…

EVERY acc that YOU make YOU can recover, iv tried it… i made an account… did some things and gave it to my friend who was involved in the testing, he changed every thing and added recovs…

I recovered it back next day…

and i never set recovery questions…

Risk of getting banned usually is not to bad…

Risk of recov: 80+%

Read full topic

item.title: Buying rs2 acc's?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Ok, I won’t bother with statistics.

If you buy an account, you need to be aware and know any of the following things:
Does the account have recoveries?
Has the account been autoed on?
Is the account banned?
Is the account hacked?
How many people have used the account?

Etc etc, basically, anything that may get the account banned is no good if your buying. You also need to know if the user also uses other accounts and has them banned. If everything looks clean as a whistle, then the only thing stopping you from getting the account unbanned is if jagex has systems in place to monitor accounts and if they are smart enough to know if the account was sold/given away.

Also, a small thing you should be aware of, the original user can recover the account without recoveries. All he needs to do is make up some bullshit story like it was hacked, provide the first password and some small information. You need to trust who you are buying it from.

Read full topic
